content: मुसलः --लं {@--1@} A mace, club. {@--2@} A pestle (used for cleaning rice); मुमलमिदमियं च पातकाले पुहरनुयाति कलेन हुकृतेन <ls>Mu. 1. 4</ls>; <ls>Ms. 6. 56.</ls> {@--3@} A kind of surgical instrument.
